title: Specific definitions
context: PART IV. PROVISIONS AFFECTING SYSTEM STRUCTURE A. Specific Definitions [ยง302A-901] Specific definitions. For the purposes of sections 302A-1154 to 302A-1163, &ldquo;school&rdquo; means any day care center, child care facility, headstart program, preschool, kindergarten, elementary, or secondary school, public or private, including any special school for children in the State. [L 1996, c 89, pt of ยง2]
